text.text: To grow your business you need to sell more and sell to more. First, by engaging the existing customers to sell more, and second by reaching out new markets and prospects to sell it to more. Whether you are planning to send a text offers, or your application triggers notifications, alerts or reminders for customers/ partners, we have got a solution for you. It is easy to use on its marketing side, and adaptable on the transactional messaging side. Our platform is flexible to integrate across variety of industries. Moreover! If you are interested in custom development tailored according to your specific requirements.

Our endeavor is all about providing you an effortless experience of sending and scaling text engagement campaigns. So that you concentrate on your goals, marketing strategies and business growth, while MumaraSMS takes care of the rest.
